text: General Rowland Hill, 1st Viscount Hill, (11 August 1772 â€“ 10 December 1842) was a British Army officer. He served in the Napoleonic Wars as a brigade, division and corps commander. He became Commander-in-Chief of the British Army in 1828. == Footnotes == == References == * * * * * * == Other websites == * |- |- Category:1772 births Category:1842 deaths Category:British Army officers
